column4: hey guys, I try to log into gnome as normal but it keeps stalling on the splash screen (metacity is displayed).  It stalls there then.  The only way I can now log into gnome is via gnome failsafe.  Is there a way I can check and resolve the problem?
try logging in via a virtual Terminal (alt-f1) and remove all the .gconf things. that'll loose gnome-settings too, but at least you can log in.
where are they located?  in the home dir?
